檝字的基本解释

檝
jí
同“楫”。

檝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jí］
［《廣韻》即葉切，入葉，精。］
亦作“檝1”。亦作“艥1”。
(1)船桨。短曰楫，长曰櫂。
(2)划船；划水。
(3)指船。
(4)通“輯”。聚集。

檝字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　檝； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页557第12
同楫。【管子·兵法篇】歷水谷，不須舟檝。【淮南子·主術訓】舟檝所通，莫不賔服。

檝字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
檝字的起名意思

同“楫”，指船桨。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jí］
["Guangyun" means that the leaves are cut, enter the leaves, and refined. ]
Also known as "Liao 1". Also known as "艥1".
(1) Oars. The short is 楫, and the long is 棹.
(2) Rowing; rowing.
(3) Refers to the ship.
(4) Through "Edit". Gather.
檝
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　檝; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 557 No. 12
The same. [Guanzi·Art of War] Lishui Valley, without a boat. 【Huainanzi·Master Skill Training】Zhouyao is mastered, and you can't help but wear a bladder.
